description: A debarred entity is a record of a person or company that has been debarred or prohibited from some activity, e.g. disqualified from being a director, or on a sanctions list

filing_date.description: Date on which the filing was made â€“ note this is not necessarily the same date as the date on which it was published or the reporting/applicable data on the information contained within it

debarment_type.description: Type of debarment. This field is required

uid.description: Unique id/reference for the filing if it has one

title.description: The title of the filing, if given

description.description: The description or precis of the filing, if given

url.description: Persistent URL for the filing, if there is one

source_url.description: Source url of the web page for the filing or if there is not persistent URL the page from which it can be found (e.g. search page). This field is required.

start_date.description: Date on which the debarment started
Date on which the debarment ended, or is scheduled to end

retrieved_at.description: Date-time this was retrieved from the source

sample_date.description: Date on which we know this to be true (usually date this information was retrieved from the source)

other_attributes.description: Use for other attributes for which we don't yet have curated schema attributes
